name: roidmismart
0:
”Alexa, ask robot smart to start cleaning”
”Alexa, ask robot smart to stop cleaning”
”Alexa, ask robot smart to start charge”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: robot smart
des:
To use this skill, click "Enable" above and sign in with your Roidmi App account to link your robot. You must create an Roidmi account and register your robot in the Roidmi App.

Here are some of the phrases you can use for voice commands to control what your vacuum does in your home. Use these to start, stop, pause, locate and send it back to its charging station.

START
• "Alexa, ask robot smart to clean"
• "Alexa, ask robot smart to start cleaning"

STOP
• "Alexa, ask robot smart to stop clean"
• "Alexa, ask robot smart to stop cleaning"

RESUME
• "Alexa, ask robot smart to resume"
• "Alexa, ask robot smart to resume clean"

FIND ROBOT
• "Alexa, ask robot smart to say hi"
• "Alexa, ask robot smart to say hi for me "


SEND BACK TO CHARGING STATION
• "Alexa, ask robot smart to start charge"

CHANGE MODE
• "Alexa, ask robot smart to change to silent"
• "Alexa, ask robot smart to change to balanced"
• "Alexa, ask robot smart to change to turbo"
• "Alexa, ask robot smart to change to Max"
• "Alexa, ask robot smart to switch to silent"
• "Alexa, ask robot smart to switch to balanced"
• "Alexa, ask robot smart to switch to turbo"
• "Alexa, ask robot smart to switch to Max"
